CareLink Access Request CareLink is a web-based, read-only version of Connect for our community affiliates. Community affiliates may include community providers and their office staff, utilization reviewers, payors, auditors, and research data monitors.
Please note: If there is no response from your approver/manager within 7 business days, your request will be cancelled and you will have to submit a new request.

CONFIDENTIALITY STATEMENT and COMPUTER SYSTEMS ACCEPTABLE USAGE AGREEMENT

I understand and acknowledge that:

It is my legal and ethical responsibility as an authorized user to preserve and protect the privacy, confidentiality and security of all protected health information, proprietary and other confidential information relating to HonorHealth, its patients, activities, affiliates, in accordance with law and HonorHealth policy.

I agree to access, use or disclose confidential information only in the performance of my HonorHealth duties, when required or permitted by law, and to disclose information only to persons who have the right to receive that information. When using or disclosing protected health information or confidential information, I will use or disclose only the minimum information necessary.

I agree to discuss confidential information only in my workplace and for HonorHealth -related purposes. I will not knowingly discuss any confidential information within the hearing of other persons who do not have the right to receive the information. I agree to protect the confidentiality of any protected health information, proprietary or other confidential information which is disclosed to me in the course of my relationship with HonorHealth.

I hereby agree, as a condition of continued access to HonorHealth’s computer systems, to abide by the policies and procedures described in HonorHealth’s policies. I understand that access to HonorHealth’s computer systems is a privilege and monitored, and which may be revoked at any time at the sole discretion of HonorHealth.

I understand that it is my responsibility to follow safe computing guidelines. To this end, I agree not to share my Login or User ID and/or password with anyone, or use the Login or User ID of any other user, and that any access to HonorHealth electronic information made using my Login or User ID and password is my responsibility. If I believe that someone else has used my Login or User ID and password, or if I know of any violation of HonorHealth policy, I will immediately report the use to the appropriate Information Systems Department or the HonorHealth Corporate Compliance Department and request a new password.
